page.title: 06LAW & ORDER IN HAZLEMERE
page.content: Hazlemere is a quiet residential area. sometimes things go wrong and we have a local policeman to sort these things out.This policeman is called P.C.Burroughs. He is a foot policeman,but sometimes he rides his bike.P.C.Burroughs travels around alot, as there is not much crime in the village.He occasionally visits our school to talk about the dangers of strangers,water and cycling.Sometimes there are groups of mods,skinheads, punks and rockers trying to act hard, but really they don't do any harm because they don't act like they look. P.C.Sorenson is the community policeman in Holmer Green.His two main problems are petty vandalism and groups of teenagers who congregate around the pond and ride their motorbikes through the village.
